text: Had an interesting interview with a recruiter looking for a HubSpot Engineer (can be fully remote). The job pays good (80k-90K) but they are looking for someone that can do 40 hours a week and Iâ€™m not looking to leave my current job (just contract work). I would be happy to pass a couple people along if you are interested DM me. Qualification they are looking for 1) US based. 2) 5+ as an engineer on a CRM platform (2 years of that HubSpot). 3) Extensive experience with HubSpot integration, Zapier a plus. 4) 5 years experience developing workflows and pipelines. If I get a lot of responses I will choose the best ones based on your linkedIn if you send me a link.

Hi! RevvGo is learning and professional development platform and we are looking for a mid-level Web Developer to help build out our HubSpot pages and integrate with our backend systems (Commerce, learning management system, Community, et al). If you have 3+ years of HubSpot experience and 5+ years of web development and integration experience, please respond to our job post on linkedin. <https://www.linkedin.com/jobs/view/2916027210/?refId=CSM07c%2FMRiSKGdMqbla1OA%3D%3D|RevvGo Job>
Hi Thomas, I just happen to post a job that might be down your alley. It is a contract position and we are possibly open to part-time depending on how much time you have.
Thanks Calvin I will check it out.
